entry.title: Quote of the Day
entry.content:
I am going to court next week. I have been selected for jury duty. It is kind of insane case: Six thousand ants dressed up as rice and robbed a Chinese restaurant. I don’t think they did it. I know a few of them and they won’t do anything like that

- Steven Wright

entry.title: I don’t tell lawyer jokes. Lawyers don’t think they’re funny and everyone else doesn’t think they’re jokes.
entry.content:
I don’t tell lawyer jokes. Lawyers don’t think they’re funny and everyone else doesn’t think they’re jokes.

Lawyer joke
